trans-unit.source: Pastas depends on a number of Python packages, of which all of the necessary are automatically installed when using the pip install manager. To summarize, the following packages are necessary for a minimal function installation of Pastas:
trans-unit.target: Pastas depende de un número de paquetes de Python,de los cuales todos los necesarios se instalan automáticamente cuando se utiliza el gestor de instalación de pip.En resumen,los siguientes paquetes son necesarios para una instalación de función mínima de Pastas:

trans-unit.source: Pastas is an open source python package for processing, simulating and analyzing hydrological time series (models). The object oriented structure allows for the quick implementation of new model components. Time series models can be created, calibrated, and analysed with just a few lines of python code with the built-in optimization, visualisation, and statistical analysis tools.
trans-unit.target: Pastas es un paquete de pitón de código abierto para procesar,simular y analizar series temporales hidrológicas (modelos).La estructura orientada a objetos permite la rápida implementación de nuevos componentes del modelo.Los modelos de series temporales pueden ser creados,calibrados y analizados con sólo unas pocas líneas de código pitón con las herramientas incorporadas de optimización,visualización y análisis estadístico.

trans-unit.source: Pastas: what is it?
trans-unit.target: Pastas:¿qué es?

trans-unit.source: Pull requests will only be accepted on the development branch (dev) of this repository. Please take a look at the developers section on the documentation website for more information on how to contribute to Pastas.
trans-unit.target: Pull requests will only be accepted on the development branch (dev) of this repository. Please take a look at the developers section on the documentation website for more information on how to contribute to Pastas.

trans-unit.source: Python package to perform time series analysis of hydrological time series.
trans-unit.target: Paquete Python para realizar análisis de series temporales de series temporales hidrológicas.

trans-unit.source: Questions on Pastas can be asked and answered on Github Discussions.

trans-unit.source: To cite a specific version of Python, you can use the DOI provided for each official release (>0.9.7) through Zenodo. Click on the link to get a specific version and DOI, depending on the Pastas version.

trans-unit.source: To install Pastas, a working version of Python 3.6, 3.7 or 3.8 has to be installed on your computer. We recommend using the Anaconda Distribution with Python 3.7 as it includes most of the python package dependencies and the Jupyter Notebook software to run the notebooks. However, you are free to install any Python distribution you want.
trans-unit.target: To install Pastas, a working version of Python 3.6, 3.7 or 3.8 has to be installed on your computer. We recommend using the Anaconda Distribution with Python 3.7 as it includes most of the python package dependencies and the Jupyter Notebook software to run the notebooks. However, you are free to install any Python distribution you want.
